Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
@LabsAssistant 
Major update to StakedNotary and SuperNET. 
This allows us to run dual (or any amount of iguanas really), by setting the ports and branch in assetchains.json. 
I added for now CFEKMYLO chain, which is funded and running on blackjok3r branch of iguana and utxocache branch of komodod. 
To get this working Please do the following:
```shell
cd ~/StakedNotary
./stop.sh
git checkout many_iguana
git pull
./start.sh
sudo ufw allow 8222 comment 'blackjok3r_iguana'
sudo ufw allow 47217 comment 'CFEKMYLO'
```

I finally fixed many long outstanding bugs/annoyances while doing this, so there may be more bugs :abusedsmily: 
The daemons no longer pipe to /dev/null, it is now using screen.  For example: 
```shell
screen -r staked
screen -r blackjok3r
screen -r KMD
screen -r LABS
screen -r CFEKMYLO
```
staked is the branch of iguana notatriing LABS.
blackjok3r is the branch of iguana notarizing CFEKMYLO 
KMD is the KMD deamon etc... 
I was able to make TMUX panes, and load the screens into them. Although the detach hot key no longer works, at least we can now read the stdout. Its been a long time comming.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
```34147e48 ht.130 [0] ips.7 CFEKMYLO NOTARIZE.7 matches.0 paxmatches.6 bestmatches.0 bestk.-1:-1 0 recv.28059 sigmasks.(0 0) senderind.4 state.0 (b38af001 0 0) MoM.d60481025429bfb78d8535b2862614cbddbc9f75b3444b00d6251b29862d6e9c [129]
```
Might be a good idea to explain what this means. 
matches is the amount of nodes that match bestk and recvmask 
paxmatches, is the MoM/MoMoM, This is a good way to see the amount of nodes connected, as its always in consensus 
bestmatches is a matching bestk, recvmask, and bestmask. When it reaches minsigs nodes, notarition happens.
But bestmatches cannot get past -1, until min sigs nodes agree on recmask. As more nodes come online this number increases dynamically each round, then lowers every 30s to  lower number untlil there are enough nodes in agreement, if consensus cannot be reached, due to nodes going offline.
